text: misl un logo ke jo tum se pehle thein,tum mein se wo zyada quwwath wale thein aur zyada mal wa aulad wale thein,pus wo apna deeni hisa barath gae,phir tum ne bhi apna hisa barath liya jaise tum se pehle ke log apne hisse se faeda mandh hoe thein aur tum ne bhi isi tarah mazaqana bahez ki jaise ke unhone ki thi,un ke amaal dunya aur aqirath mein gharath ho gae,yahi log nuqsan pane wale hai
